results.firPara: It has been an awful week for Southampton. A heavy defeat at Crystal Palace was followed by elimination from the Europa League and a serious injury to Charlie Austin, the only player who has scored regularly for the club this season. Middlesbrough have lost only one match away in the league this season and will feel confident of adding to Claude Puels woes. Paul Doyle

Alan Pardew does not really do sheepish but if and, almost certainly when, he comes face to face with David Meyler on Saturday Crystal Palaces invariably assured manager will surely look a little uncomfortable.
results.secPara: There might be a slightly awkward handshake and, perhaps, a rueful smile as Pardew returns to the scene of the crime and relives the awful afternoon of 1 March 2014 when he inexplicably head-butted the Hull City midfielder.
results.webTitle: Why Alan Pardew knows he will be butt of jokes as he heads back to Hull | Louise Taylor

results.firPara: AFC Bournemouth have announced plans to move from their ground of 106 years and hope to have built a new stadium by the start of the 2020-21 season. The Premier League club released a statement on Friday in which they expressed their frustrations in attempts to buy the current stadium back from Stuctadene, a London-based property company, from whom Bournemouth currently lease the Vitality Stadium.
results.secPara: Bournemouths chief executive, Neill Blake, in a statement on behalf of the clubs board of directors, said the club feel we have no other option but to find a new site and are working with Bournemouth Borough Council to identify a suitable location.
results.webTitle: AFC Bournemouth begin search for new stadium site for 2020-21 season

results.firPara: Adjusting to life in the Premier League fast lane has been an eye-opener for Alex Iwobi. He still has to suppress the urge to beam when the television cameras pan down the lineup of players in the tunnel before a game. Look serious, Alex, he reminds himself, even if he is exhilarated inside.
results.secPara: Away from the pitch, dealing with attention is a new experience in itself. Whether it is a stranger bowling up to him in a shop while he is buying trainers for a friend to impersonate his goal celebration, or a fan following his car for miles while he was driving away from the Emirates with his mum, Iwobi is doing his utmost to take it all in his steady stride.
results.webTitle: Alex Iwobi: ‘I did extra training. My mum made me do kick-ups in the living room’

results.firPara: Twenty years ago, a tall 22-year-old was attending classes at UNC and dreaming of a career in pro soccer. By the end of the year, hed scored the winning goal in the first ever MLS Cup final, and was an Olympic star to boot
results.secPara: Twenty years ago, a tall 22-year-old was attending classes at UNC and dreaming of a career in pro soccer. By the end of the year, hed scored the winning goal in the first ever MLS Cup final, and was an Olympic star to boot

results.firPara: Seattle and TFC have never reached a championship game before – so Saturdays final should be extra special. Our MLS writers discuss whats likely to go down
results.secPara: Seattle and TFC have never reached a championship game before – so Saturdays final should be extra special. Our MLS writers discuss whats likely to go down
results.webTitle: Seattle Sounders or Toronto FC? Our writers predict the MLS Cup final

results.firPara: It took the sudden passing of the 28-year-old England right-back in 1959 to get a generation pouring into clinics for inoculation against a disease that in the previous 10 years had killed over 3,000 people in England and Wales
results.secPara: On the face of it there was nothing particularly memorable about Birmingham Citys 1-1 draw at relegation-bound Portsmouth in March 1959 but for the sense of disappointment the visitors took from it. Blues did themselves no credit in this so-casual stroll in the sun, wrote Dennis Shaw in Birminghams Sports Argus. Portsmouth did all they could to show why they have not won a league game since November. Blues were little better. After shooting into the lead shortly before the interval they just hadnt the skill, and the drive, nor the determination to run up a hefty total. On a pitch like concrete the ball was ballooned back and forth over the halfway line like a ping-pong game.
results.webTitle: The forgotten story of … Jeff Hall, the footballer whose death turned tide against polio | Simon Burnton

results.firPara: Todays fluff is going nowhere fast

results.firPara: Sepp Blatter says his successor Gianni Infantino has shown him no respect by failing to return his phone calls.
results.secPara: The disgraced former Fifa president lost his Court of Arbitration for Sport (Cas) appeal on Monday against a six-year ban for ethics violations, imposed amid the biggest corruption scandal to hit world footballs governing body.
results.webTitle: Sepp Blatter: Gianni Infantino has shown me no respect
